TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit FileNotFoundException extends System.IO.IOException

summary.span: 嘗試存取磁碟上不存在的檔案失敗時，所擲回的例外狀況。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when an attempt to access a file that does not exist on disk fails.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FileNotFoundException` 會使用其值為 0x80070002 HRESULT COR_E_FILENOTFOUND。`FileNotFoundException` uses the HRESULT COR_E_FILENOTFOUND which has the value 0x80070002. 如果您的程式碼並沒有權限的錯誤訊息，此例外狀況可能只包含檔案或目錄的名稱，而不是完整路徑。If your code does not have permission, the error message for this exception may only contain file or directory names instead of fully qualified paths.

related.span: 在 .NET 中處理和擲回例外狀況

span.span: Handling and throwing exceptions in .NET

summary.span: 使用選擇性的訊息字串和內部 參考，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with optional message string and inner reference.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 使用將其訊息字串設定為系統提供的訊息，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with its message string set to a system-supplied message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式初始化屬性的新執行個體的系統提供的訊息描述錯誤，例如 「 找不到指定的檔案。 」This constructor initializes the property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "Could not find the specified file." 此訊息會考量目前的系統文化特性。This message takes into account the current system culture.

span.span: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.

summary.span: 使用指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 被擲回以做為前一個例外狀況直接結果的例外狀況，應該在 屬性中包含對前一個例外狀況的參考。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the property. 屬性會傳回與傳入建構函式中相同的值；如果 `null` 屬性沒有提供內部例外值給建構函式，則傳回 。The property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor. 下表顯示 執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||內部例外狀況參考。The inner exception reference.| ||錯誤訊息字串。The error message string.| 如需有關內部例外狀況的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information on inner exceptions, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Message As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Message { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得解釋例外狀況原因的錯誤訊息。

span.span: Gets the error message that explains the reason for the exception.
The error message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目前的例外狀況的建構函式不提供的任何訊息，則這個屬性會傳回系統提供的錯誤訊息。If no message was supplied to the constructor for the current exception, this property returns a system-supplied error message. 如果屬性不是`null`，訊息包含的檔案名稱。If the property is not `null`, the message includes the file name. 這個屬性是唯讀的。This property is read-only.

span.span: File and Stream I/O
How to: Read Text from a File
How to: Write Text to a File

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToString () As String

summary.span: 傳回這個例外狀況的完整名稱、可能的錯誤訊息、內部例外的名稱和堆疊追蹤。

span.span: Returns the fully qualified name of this exception and possibly the error message, the name of the inner exception, and the stack trace.

returns.span: 這個例外狀況的完整名稱、可能的錯誤訊息、內部例外狀況的名稱和堆疊追蹤。

span.span: The fully qualified name of this exception and possibly the error message, the name of the inner exception, and the stack trace.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會覆寫 。This method overrides . 這個方法所傳回的字串表示法包含例外狀況，值名稱屬性中，內部例外狀況的值上呼叫 ToString 的結果屬性，並呼叫的結果.The string representation returned by this method includes the name of the exception, the value of the property, the result of calling ToString on the inner exception, the value of the property, and the result of calling . 如果任何這些成員為 null 參考，其值不會包含在傳回的字串。If any of these members is a null reference, its value is not included in the returned string.
